Aaptiv | Team Lead - Search and Recommendations | New York, NY | ONSITE

Aaptiv is the fastest growing mobile fitness product on the market. Our app synchronizes the voice of a trainer with a playlist of all the music you love, to deliver fun and motivating guided workouts straight to your earbuds. In a little over two years, we've gotten to ~200,000 paying customers and about 70 employees (with about 1/3 of them in engineering.) It's an exciting time to join Aaptiv and we'd love to have you be a part of it.

We're hiring for a number of engineering roles including: - Team Lead (Search and Recommendations) - Team Lead (Core Services) - Software Engineer (WordPress) - Senior iOS Engineer - Senior Android Engineer

All roles are full time and onsite in our NYC office.

Some of the technologies we use include Python/flask, AWS, Elasticsearch, Java, Node/Express, React and Postgres.

For more information on the roles, check out http://aaptiv.com/jobs or send me an email at kathleen at aaptiv dot com.

For more info on Aaptiv, check out this recent Forbes article on us: https://www.forbes.com/sites/alexkonrad/2017/11/30/how-aapti...
